memberdef.argsstring: (const char *test_name, hf_u64_t start_time, hf_u32_t operations) noexcept
memberdef.name: log_performance_metrics

briefdescription.para: Comprehensive Logger testing suite for ESP32-C6 DevKit-M-1 (noexcept)

detaileddescription.para: This file contains a dedicated, comprehensive test suite for the EspLogger class targeting ESP32-C6 with ESP-IDF v5.5+. It provides thorough testing of all logging functionalities including basic operations, level management, statistics, diagnostics, buffer logging, and ESP-IDF Log V2 features.
All functions are noexcept - no exception handling used.
